entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump If you're unhappy with Twitter why don't you just leave? No one has a "right" to tweet. People do have a right to breathe though. Over 103,000 people dead from #COVID19 & many African Americans from both racism & COVID19! Take responsibility!! #RacismAndCovid19 #RightToBreathe https://t.co/tGwcFKMtVc
